data.title: Yekaterinburg, Russia
data.meta_description: July weather for Yekaterinburg, Russia: The month with the most rainfall in Yekaterinburg is July, when the rain falls for 15 days and typically aggregates up to 89mm (3.5") of precipitation. July stands out as Yekaterinburg's warmest month, with an average high-temperature of 24.4°C (75.9°F) and a low-temperature of 14.4°C (57.9°F).
data.text:
Average high temperature in July: 24.4°C

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is July (24.4°C).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is January (-9.1°C).

Average low temperature in July: 14.4°C

The month with the highest average low temperature is July (14.4°C).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is January (-15.7°C).

Average snowfall days in July

Yekaterinburg, Russia

Average snowfall days in July: 0 days

The month with the highest number of snowfall days is January (25 days).

The months with the least snowfall days are June, July and August (0 days).

Average daylight in July /

Average sunshine in July

Yekaterinburg, Russia

Average daylight in July: 17h and 1min

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 17h and 42min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 6h and 54min).

Average sunshine in July: 8h and 4min

The month with the most sunshine is June (Average sunshine: 9h and 6min).

The month with the least sunshine is December (Average sunshine: 1h and 12min).

Average UV index in July

Yekaterinburg, Russia

Average UV index in July: 6

The months with the highest UV index are June and July (UV index 6).

The months with the lowest UV index are January, November and December (UV index 0).
